name: Nite Ize Tool Holster Stretch Sheath
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: Make your multi-tool or Swiss Army Knife a lot handier by keeping it close at hand. The Tool Holster holds your gadget of choice safe yet accessible on your belt, pack waistband, or shoulder strap.Made of rugged ballistic nylon and moulded EVA foam.Elastic side panels snug or expand to fit virtually any size multi-tool or pocket knife.Secure snap lid closure.Super-strong over-and-under flex clip attaches to belts, waistbands, and straps up to 6cm wide.Clip rotates 360 degrees and locks in eight different positions for tool access from all angles.Small sleeve at back of the holster holds small accessories and components.External case dimensions are 14 x 6.4 x 5.7cm.
